scripts.build: npm run build:back && npm run build:front
scripts.watch: tmux new-session -d "printf '\033]2;%s\033\' 'watch:back' && npm run watch:back" && tmux split-window -d "printf '\033]2;%s\033\' 'watch:front' && npm run watch:front" && tmux select-layout even-horizontal && tmux set -g pane-border-status top && tmux attach
scripts.test-reports: npm run build && rm -fr .xunit coverage && docker-compose up -d db mailcatcher  && npm run test -- --cover --test-report
